title: Great Place to Work
content:
What is the type that reads "Institute México"?

Not Futura, Century Gothic, Avant Garde, Metro, Bell Gothic, etc

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730155149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_great_place_to_work_6495.gif)
author: rs_donsata

comments.content:
Got a related image. Higer quality.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730155149im_/http:/typophile.com/files/great%20place%20to%20work_tcm40-22278_5656.jpg)
Not Futura, and not Gill Sans. I'm stumped. Futura Medium Condensed was close.
I think it’s Gill Sans Condensed, actually.
That S looks like Gill, but what about that C ?

Gill Sans Condensed indeed.

Thanks all and sorry for not looking appropiately before asking.
